result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Preston T. Devinny

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: $443.00 to linked case #15CM900 and $57.00 to linked case #15CM950.  gb/cp

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Jeremy Chavez.  Case dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement w/15CM950 & 15CM900.  Bond to be applied towards financial obligations in 15CM950/15CM900.  Bond forfeiture is vacated.
Bond forfeiture hrg set for 8/25/15 cancelled; bond forfeiture will be addressed at the FPT on 9/8/15.  Attys notified via email

ADDRESS INFO for Preston T. Devinny
Current: 2204 61st St, Kenosha, WI 53143 United States  (Effective: 07-27-2015)
Prior: 2408 61st Street  Upper, Kenosha, WI 53143

116 p.m.  Special Prosecutor K. Richard Wells appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Jeremy Chavez  Clk  LE  Warrant vacated. FPT on 9/8/15 @ 140 p.m. & JS on 9/28/15 @ 9 a.m.  $500  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).
Warrant served, def. in custody.  Return on warrant today at 1:00 before Intake Commissioner.

Attorney Andrew Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Atty Jeremy Chavez appeared for def.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Def. did not appear.  Atty Chavez reports def. is homeless and has no phone.  Signature bond ordered forfeited.  Bench warrant authorized with a $500 cash bond.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Jeremy Chavez.  Atty Chavez reports he has been unable to meet with the deft prior to today - had no contact information.  ADA Burgoyne reported an offer had been relayed to defense counsel on May 21st.  Per Court, leave on for JS for 7/6/15 @ 9am.  Parties will have until 7/1/15 to settle the case.  If case is not resolved, ludwig hrg will be held prior to trial.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

2:52  Special Prosecutor Attorney Jerrold Hinshaw appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Carl Johnson. Clerk LE.   Plea of Not Guilty entered. PTC 5-22-15 @ 1:40 pm, FPT 6-17-15 @ 1:40 pm, JS 7-6-15 @ 9:00 am  $500.00  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).

*No Contact w/Faith C, Sherman K, Joseph E, Jennifer P or their residences
947.01(1) - DC DV
Demand for Discovery filed by ADA Carli Mc Neill
and witness list filed by the State
